title: Available Now!! Spacious 1st FL 1b1b APT in quiet Adam's Point Oakland
map_address: 272 Euclid Ave unit 103 near Adams St
posting_body: Available Now!!
Spacious First floor 1 bed 1 bath apartment in quiet Adam's Point Oakland!
Showing by appointment only.
Due to the volume of inquiries, no phone calls please.
Please send email by click on "Request a tour" or "Check Availability" or "Email" with your credit score and email address, we will contact you to schedule an appointment.
Check out the 3D walkthrough of the unit:
<URL>
Unit Features:
- Spacious and functional floor plan
- Freshly paint
- Hardwood floor throughout (No carpet in the entire unit)
- Large windows bring in lots of natural light
- Kitchen appliances: Refrigerator, gas stove/oven
- Brand New Granite countertop top with breakfast bar
- Lots of kitchen cabinets
- Open and versatile living and dining area
- Full size bathtub with shower over tub
- Brand New copper water pipe
- Gas heating radiator to keep warm in cold winter days!
- Beautiful garden area in the complex to break away from daily stress
- Large walk-in closet
- Optional parking space available.
Front driveway parking for $80 per month, carport parking in the back for $50 per month
- Extra storage unit available for $30 per unit per month
Amenities:
- Coin-operated laundry room in building
- Elevator
Location:
- 10 minute walk to Transbay P bus line to SF
- 15 minute walk to the beautiful Lake Merritt
- 15 minute walk to lively Grand Avenue with lots of restaurant and bar options
- 15 minute bike ride to Lake Merritt BART station
- 30 minute walk from Fox Theatre, a popular venue for concerts and shows
- Close proximity to Downtown Oakland that offers great selections for shopping, restaurants and entertainment
Lease terms:
- $1,750 monthly rent
- $1,750 security deposit
- Credit score 650 or above
- No eviction record
- No smoking in the unit
- No smoking in the unit
- No pets
- Minimum 12 months lease
- Water and trash removal included in the rent
- Tenant pays for gas, electricity, internet and cable
- Optional parking space available.
Front driveway parking for $80 per month, carport parking in the back for $50 per month
- Extra storage unit available for $30 per unit per month
- Tenant required to carry renter's insurance policy ($500K liability)
- Deposit and 1st month rent due at lease signing
- Preference will be given to early move-in qualified tenants
Offered and managed by The Cal Agents Realty, DRE# 02020017
